persName.roleName: Queen of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Ireland Empress of India

note.p: Birth: Kensington Palace, London, England (24 May 1819)
Death: Osborne, Isle of Wight (22 January 1901)
Career: Crowned in Westminster Abbey (28 June 1838)
References: T E Allibone, 'Philately and the Royal Society' in NR 1992 vol 46 pp 129-154
